glsa.title: GOffice: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities in GOffice could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GOffice is a library of document-centric objects and utilities based on GTK.

description.p: GOffice includes a copy of PCRE which is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows and memory corruptions vulnerabilities (GLSA 200711-30).

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open specially crafted documents with GOffice, which could possibly lead to the execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service or the disclosure of sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
